00001 #include <ip-simple.h>
00002 
00003 /*
00004  * Initializes a host and send appropriate messages
00005  *
00006  * This function simply zeros out the host state and then
00007  * inits some simple values.
00008  */
00009 
00010 void
00011 ip_init(ip_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00012 {
00013         bzero(state, sizeof(ip_state));
00014 
00015         printf("%d: IP init complete! \n", lp->id);
00016 }

00018 
00019 void
00020 ip_event_handler(ip_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00021 {
00022         tw_stime        ts = 0;
00023         tw_event        *e;
00024 
00025         rn_machine      *m;
00026         rn_link         *link;
00027 
00028         switch (msg->type)
00029         {
00030         case UPSTREAM:
00031                 msg->size -= g_ip_header;
00032                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Not going to send any event here!");
00033                 //rn_event_send();
00034                 break;
00035         case DOWNSTREAM:
00036                 m = rn_getmachine(lp->id);
00037                 link = m->link;
00038                 if (tw_now(lp) > state->lastsent)
00039                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00040                 else
00041                         ts = state->lastsent - tw_now(lp);
00042 
00043                 // should add frequency
00044 
00045                 msg->size += g_ip_header;
00046                 ts += (msg->size / link->speed + link->delay);
00047                 state->lastsent += (msg->size / link->speed);
00048 
00049                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Not going to send any event here!");
00050                 //rn_event_send(e);
00051         }
00052 }
